int ans = 0;

int dfs(int p1, int p2, int p3) {
    if(p1+1 == p2 && p2+1 == p3) return 1;
    int maxval = 0;
    for(int i = p1+1; i < p2; i++) {
        maxval = max(maxval, dfs(p1, i, p2));
    }
    for(int i = p2+1; i < p3; i++) {
        maxval = max(maxval, dfs(p2, i, p3));
    }
    return maxval+1;
}
